title: Old Post Office Tower: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Old Post Office closed May 1, 2014 until Late 2016  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Old Post Office closed May 1, 2014 until Late 2016  Ongoing renovation work to convert the 115 year old Old Post Office building into a hotel will prevent safe visitor access and require closing the tower and observation deck to the public for approximately 2 years. more
